name: Balance Stuff
description:
I GOT 99 OBJECTS BUT A BALANCE AIN'T ONE !

‣ Forget stacking objects
‣ Forget orderly fashion
‣ Forget matching them by colours
‣ Forget beautification
‣ Forget any kind of structure

Just try and keep all the objects, any way you desire, on the table.
Just dont let them fall ! Think you can do that? Welcome to chaos !

Features :
• 300 Beautiful Levels.
• Relaxing and Stressless gameplay.
• No Time Limit.
• Game Center : Leaderboard And Achievements.
• No Violence.
• Optimised For All New iPads and iPhones.
• No Intrusive advertisements
